summary: DODGE RAM 1500 2015. TRUCK 'BOGGS' UPON ACCELERATION. THE RPM RISE ON DECELERATION CAUSING VERY HARD BRAKING. THE BOG I'M FEELING AND HEARING IN THE EXHAUST. IT LASTS FROM SECOND THROUGH THIRD GEAR THEN SMOOTHS OUT. MAKING CITY DRIVING   VERY FRUSTRATING. WHEN I DECELERATE THE RPM RISE. DEPENDING ON THE SPEED OR GEAR I'M IN DETERMINATE THE LEVEL OF RPM ACCELERATION. AT HIGHER SPEEDS THEY RISE REAL HIGH. I'VE BEEN TO TWO DODGE DEALERSHIPS AND A PERSONAL MECHANIC. THEY TELL ME THE SAME THING. 'THE TRUCK IS NOT FIRING ANY CODES, SO THERE IS NOTHING WE CAN DO'. PLEASE HELP ME.
